title: Nightfall
description: Kara is not your average high school student – smart, independent, and quiet – with a secret even she doesn’t know. Without any warning, she becomes a member of a vampire clan that learns of her secret and is thrust into a dark, unfamiliar world. She finds a tangled skein which began at the very first moment of human history. Recruited against her will to fulfill a purpose she does not agree with, she discovers that beneath the surface of her once peaceful world lay deception, betrayal, and murder.
author: Winter Trabex
